page.title: 16Cottesmore Cubs at Camp
page.content: We went to Cub Camp on 28th June 1985 at Ullesthorp.The first thing we did was dive into our tents,because as soon as we got our tents pitched it started to rain.That night we got to bed at 3 A.M. In the morning we did the Grand Howl,our tribe was called Arapaho.We had a number of events that day:horse shoe throwing,rope climbing, and the rodeo.We went through the woods using our compasses.We ate beans at every meal except one which was a casserole.We sat by the camp fire we sang a lot of songs and it started to rain and we all had to stay in our tents.We made some paper guns and head_bands.On the second day we were allowed to dress up as Indians,I got given some war paint.Then we went home on the Sunday.
